title: Destination Phuket and Krabi

Phuket and Krabi Tours

Phuket 

Phuket known for Beaches and Island. Book online Phuket tour Best and cheap at TNG Holidays thailand tour Package. We deals in Sight seening, hotel transfer and Activites at Bangkok, Pattaya, Phuket, Krabi and Chiang Mai, Thailand. 

Phuket is one of the best tourist destination for family and love couples in Thailand. A beautiful and historical island, the place is home to some breathtaking tourist attractions and iconic viewpoints. You can experience some wonderful time by experiencing activities and Sight seening by availing the facility of Phuket tour packages. Tour package is a proper way to explore the island as you get the facility of Phuket travel guide who provide knowledge about popular places, things and activities that you can explore in the city to have a great time.

Some other exciting things to do in Phuket 

• Spend a Day or two on Phi-Phi Island

• Explore Night Markets in Phuket

• Witness FantaSea Show in Phuket 

• Take a visit Karon View Point

• Spend exciting time at Tiger Kingdom

Krabi tours

krabi known for Beaches and Island. Book online krabi tour Best and cheap at TNG Holidays thailand tour Package. We deals in Sight seening, hotel transfer and Activites at Bangkok, Pattaya, Phuket, Krabi and Chiang Mai, Thailand. 

Krabi offers something for each traveler willing to go to the heavenly bliss with context to the Krabi Tour Packages and Krabi Honeymoon Packages. Whether you're a soul seeker or a fun-loving party quite traveler, Krabi will meet your expectations perfectly. Some destinations are ideal for holidays and then there are some that are meant just for vacations and getaways. For tourists who are headed to Krabi, there might be no better choice. this tiny town proves the adage ‘good things are available small packages’ right, because albeit it's small in terms of area, the opportunities that it offers for fun are near to limitless. Thus, Krabi tour packages are becoming popular with globetrotters. Sitting on the shores of the Andaman Sea , Krabi is a town that has such a lot to share that there's no chance that tourists would get bored here. From sandy beaches to glistening pools of fresh water, there's such a lot to experience here. 

There also are coral reefs stretching as far as the eye can see and caves tucked faraway from public attention. A tour package to Krabi lets tourists explore over 130 islands that comprise this a part of Thailand. a number of the more popular islands are Mu Koh Poda, Mu Koh Hong and Poda Island. Not only do these islands have great beaches, but also facilities that tourists would search for on a vacation .

Places to Explore at Krabi:

The beautiful province of Krabi in Thailand isn't only famous globally for its quaint beaches and blue waters; rather, it's some of the renowned sightseeing options which will be explored too. The Krabi Emerald Pool, Krabi park and Krabi Tiger Cave are those that witness thousands of tourists per annum and are a crucial a part of Krabi Tour Packages. apart from this, tourists can check out Ao Nang, Railay, Phi Phi Island and even Koh Lanta that are positioned at close proximity to Krabi.

Activities to be enjoyed at Krabi:

The best a part of visiting Krabi is that it provides ample opportunities for travelers to loves spending memorable moments of their life. Besides enjoying the exotic time on the beaches, one can try various amazing things to try to to in Krabi, one can explore hiking , island hopping, snorkeling, jungle trekking, sea kayaking, and skin diving . With such a spread of activities, the tourists can surely have the bliss to require pleasure in exploring Krabi from various spots. it's a group of picturesque beaches that makes it worthy of exploring its scintillating beauty. In fact, one can acquire training in scuba diving to observe underwater life.

Phuket Tourism

Whether you are travelling with your family and friends for seaside fun or with your partner searching for some romantic places, there is so much to experience in Phuket. Apart from being blessed with beautiful beaches, it is also rich in its cultural heritage. With a Phuket holiday package, you can explore and witness the various culturally rich museums and historic mansions. Moreover, it is near the popular diving site, Ko Phi-Phi, where you can enjoy the opportunity to connect with the underwater creatures. Certainly, a Phuket trip has everything to make unforgettable memories for life. 

Things to do in Phuket

There are plenty of memorable things to do in Phuket for a picture-perfect holiday and Phuket packages will help you take part in most of these thrilling and fun activities. You should definitely visit the Phuket Trickeye Museum to enjoy the 3D gallery dotted with magnificent paintings created by Korean artists. A Phuket trip can be considered incomplete without witnessing the popular FantaSea show. It is a very entertaining cultural Thai show that represents various aspects of Thai culture. For a unique experience, visit the Nakkerd Hills to see the mesmerising sight of a giant statue of Buddha sitting between Chalong and Kata. The Phuket Big Buddha is among the most visited Phuket tourist attractions. Make a stop at Wat Chalong which is among the beautiful and popular temples in this place and was made to honour the two monks, Luang Pho Chuang and Luang Pho Chaem. Wander the streets of Old Phuket Town to admire the stunning architecture and explore the ancient shops, Sino-Portuguese temples, shrines and mansions. Enjoy the busy streets dotted with hotels, massage parlours, restaurants and many other tourist attractions during your Phuket holidays. For an exciting experience, you should also add a boating tour in Phang Nga Bay to your Phuket itinerary. Also, you can have the mouth-watering street food at the Sunday Walking Street Market. The Phuket packages will let you experience the culture, lifestyle and beauty of this place in all its glory.

Places to visit in Phuket

With an exceptional climate, travellers flock from across the world to Phuket for a relaxing stay and exciting adventures. There are multiple places to visit in Phuket and Phuket packages include visits to so many beautiful and interesting sights and places. There are a number of splendid sandy beaches in Phuket which have their own distinct character. Phuket holidays are incomplete without visiting the popular beaches such as Patong Beach, Nai Harn Beach, Karon Beach and Surin Beach. During the Phuket trip, travellers can explore Rawai Village which is one of the authentic places to see in Phuket and witness the lifestyle of Monken tribe of sea gypsies. Koh Panyee, a small village located in the centre of Phang Nga Bay, is one of the major highlights of Phuket sightseeing. Phi-Phi Island situated amidst the Andaman Sea is a gorgeous place that can be easily reached by daily cruises. James Bond Island, named such for being featured in a few James Bond movies, is listed among the best Phuket tourist spots. Other must-visit places in Phuket are Rang Hill, Soi Bangala Road, Chalong Bay Rum Distillery, Khao Rang Viewpoint, Jui Tui Shrine, Shrine of the Serene Light and so on. 

Phuket Holiday packages also include the visit to Sirinat National Park to let the travellers experience the quieter side of this touristy isle. It is largely made up of marine areas and is home to local turtles. 

Best time to visit Phuket

The best time to visit Phuket is winters between November and February as the weather is pleasant and cool during that time. Most of the water sports activities in a Phuket tour package like snorkelling, Scuba Diving and Jet Skiing can only be done in non-monsoon season. 

How to reach Phuket 

The best way to reach Phuket is by air. Phuket International Airport is the second largest airport after Bangkok in Thailand. It offers direct flights to various European and Asian countries. Besides, the two bus terminals allow easy access to public transportation within and outside the city.
